After seducing Adam and Eve, Satan was sentenced [THIS SENTENCE WHICH WAS IMPLEMENTED PARTIALLY AT THE CRUCIFIXION, WILL BE EXECUTED FULLY AT THE BEGINNING OF THE MILLENNIUM. SEE REVELATION 20:1-3, WHERE "THE BOTTOMLESS PIT" REPRESENTS THIS EARTH IN A CHAOTIC STATE. SEE ALSO EW 39-40, 290; GC 485, 657-661; 5BC 1149, 1150; DA 761] to confinement to this globe. "I will put enmity between thee and the woman, and between thy seed and her seed; it shall bruise thy head, and thou shalt bruise His heel" [Genesis 3:15]. This curse has reference chiefly to the originator of sin, the devil, and not to the serpent, the medium. Satan and his associates fell under the curse.
